headline.main: LINDBERGH SCORED BY 700 CHURCHMEN; Protestants Sign Declaration Assailing Anti-Semitism as Attack on Democracy

lead_paragraph: The Protestant Digest, edited by Kenneth Leslie, made public yesterday a declaration of principle, attacking Charles A. Lindbergh's Des Moines speech as marking the beginning of an anti-Semitic campaign aimed at democracy, and listed the names of 700 Protestant churchmen from all parts of the country who signed the declaration.
abstract: in statement by 700 Protestant churchmen; partial list
